attributes.action: REGULATE TO HAVE INTEREST ON SAVINGS UP TO £50K 4% OVER INFLATION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
SAVERS OF ENGLAND UNITE. 
Government is using the capital of prudent savers and pensioners to bail out greedy bonus chasers. That’s the bad news!
There is a solution! That’s the good news, read on.

By reducing interest on savings deposits the government forces savers to use their 
capital for living  expenditure, wicked; and will create paupers in the near future out 
of  people who are not greedy, also, the inflationary pressures inevitable from this 
behaviour will escalate the loss of capital!

It is difficult to believe that any government would deliberately engineer this result so 
we must see this as yet another unintentional consequence. 

Rectifying solution

Savings accounts up to £50000 are guaranteed secure, so regulate that interest paid on these account to be 4% above the inflation/bank rate. Simple.

WE WILL VOTE for the party that supports us.
